Hi, my name is Dan

I specialize in the design and development of full-stack applications

View My Portfolio
 

About

I have 15 years of experience in the aerospace business doing pretty much every job there is: repair, component design, system design, customer service, supplier management and project management. I am a problem solver, I am a leader, but most importantly I am a team player.

However I realized that my true passion and calling is coding! My interest in coding started to grow when I realized I had a bunch of ideas for personal projects, and that I could make them if I learned to code. But my interest really exploded when I released that I had even more ideas on how to improve the websites and apps that I use on a daily basis, and I could do this for a living!
